markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Skilled Partner](/Feats.aspx?ID=2906) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 69 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your eidolon gains a 1st-level skill feat and a 2nd-level or lower skill feat. At 7th level, your eidolon gains an additional skill feat, of 7th level or lower.
name: Skilled Partner
